messages.content: You are an expert TECHNICAL SALES ASSISTANT for Teklab. ALWAYS respond in the EXACT SAME LANGUAGE as the user's question. Provide expert technical consultation on Teklab products.

SEMANTIC CONCEPT: TK3+ 80bar Compressor Brand Compatibility and Flange Adapter Selection

ðŸŽ¯ CUSTOMER QUESTION: "Which compressor brands are compatible with TK3+ 80bar? Do I need adapters? How to select the right flange?"

**COMPRESSOR BRAND COMPATIBILITY & ADAPTER SELECTION**

---

**DUAL PITCH FLANGE DESIGN:**

TK3+ 80bar features **dual pitch flange** for maximum compatibility:

â€¢ **Primary pitch**: 40 mm (Bitzer, Copeland, most brands)
â€¢ **Secondary pitch**: 38 mm (Carrier, some Frascold)
â€¢ **Both holes** on same flange (no adapter needed for standard mounts)

**Advantages:**
âœ… Direct mount on 90% of compressors
âœ… No adapter needed (saves cost, installation time)
âœ… No additional leak points
âœ… Reduced system complexity

---

## COMPRESSOR COMPATIBILITY BY BRAND

### **BITZER (Reciprocating & Screw)**

**Direct Mount (No Adapter):**
âœ… All Bitzer semi-hermetic reciprocating (2-8 cylinders)
âœ… Bitzer screw compressors (CSH, HSN, OSN series)
âœ… Flange pitch: **40 mm** (TK3+ primary pitch)
âœ… Mounting: 2Ã— M6 bolts, 15-20 Nm torque

**Compatible Models:**
â€¢ 2JES / 4JE / 6JE (reciprocating)
â€¢ 4NES / 6NE / 4TES / 6TE (reciprocating)
â€¢ CSH6563 / CSH7563 / CSH8573 (screw)
â€¢ HSN6461 / HSN7461 / OSK8571 (screw)

**Refrigerant Range:**
â€¢ R410A: YES (primary application)
â€¢ R407C, R404A, R134a: YES
â€¢ All within TK3+ 80bar rating

**Oil Sump Location:**
â€¢ Bottom of compressor (vertical mount)
â€¢ TK3+ installs at **lowest point** (oil return)

---

### **COPELAND (Scroll & Reciprocating)**

**Direct Mount (No Adapter):**
âœ… Copeland scroll (ZP, ZR, ZF series)
âœ… Copeland semi-hermetic reciprocating (DLSJ, D4D, D6D)
âœ… Flange pitch: **40 mm** (TK3+ primary pitch)
âœ… Mounting: 2Ã— M6 bolts, 15-20 Nm torque

**Compatible Models:**
â€¢ **Scroll**: ZP120, ZP137, ZP154, ZP182, ZP235 (R410A)
â€¢ **Scroll**: ZR125, ZR160, ZR190, ZR250 (R404A, R134a)
â€¢ **Reciprocating**: DLSJ-200, D4DH-200, D6DJ-200

**R410A Scroll (PRIMARY APPLICATION):**
â€¢ Copeland ZP series: Designed for R410A
â€¢ High-side pressure: 26-30 bar (requires TK3+ 80bar)
â€¢ Oil: POE (Polyolester)
â€¢ TK3+ 80bar: âœ… Perfect match

**Oil Separator:**
â€¢ Many scroll systems use oil separator (high side)
â€¢ TK3+ can mount on separator (sees condenser pressure)
â€¢ Pressure: 28 bar (R410A) â†’ Safe for 80 bar sensor

---

### **CARRIER (Semi-Hermetic)**

**Direct Mount (Some Models):**
âœ… Carrier 06D / 06E series (40 mm pitch)
âœ… TK3+ secondary pitch: **38 mm** (Carrier alternate)

**Adapter Required (Other Models):**
âš ï¸ Carrier 5H / 5F series (custom pitch)
âš ï¸ Use **Carrier adapter kit** (available from Teklab)

**Carrier Adapter Kit (Part: CA-01):**
â€¢ Adapts Carrier 5H/5F to standard 40 mm
â€¢ Material: Brass CW617N
â€¢ Includes: Adapter plate, 4Ã— M6 bolts, Viton gasket
â€¢ Installation: 15 minutes

**Compatible Models:**
â€¢ **Direct**: 06D-228, 06E-299, 06E-350 (40 mm or 38 mm)
â€¢ **With adapter**: 5H40, 5H60, 5H80, 5F40, 5F60

**Refrigerant:**
â€¢ R407C, R404A, R134a (most Carrier models)
â€¢ R410A (newer models - requires TK3+ 80bar)

---

### **FRASCOLD (Semi-Hermetic)**

**Direct Mount (Most Models):**
âœ… Frascold D / V series (40 mm standard pitch)
âœ… Frascold NRH / Q series (40 mm)

**Adapter Recommended (Older Models):**
âš ï¸ Frascold S series (38 mm pitch - use secondary pitch or adapter)

**Frascold Adapter Kit (Part: FR-03):**
â€¢ Adapts 38 mm to 40 mm (or use TK3+ secondary pitch direct)
â€¢ Material: Brass, Viton gasket

**Compatible Models:**
â€¢ **Direct**: D2-13.1Y, D3-16.1Y, V5-108Y, NRH2-35-160Y
â€¢ **Secondary pitch**: S15-50.1Y, S20-62.1Y (38 mm)

**Refrigerant:**
â€¢ R404A, R407C, R134a (standard)
â€¢ R410A (newer models with POE oil)

---

### **DORIN (Semi-Hermetic)**

**Direct Mount:**
âœ… Dorin H / CD series (40 mm pitch)
âœ… All Dorin semi-hermetic (standard flange)

**Compatible Models:**
â€¢ H251CC, H303CS, H403CS (reciprocating)
â€¢ CD300H, CD400H, CD500H (reciprocating)

**Refrigerant:**
â€¢ R404A, R407C, R134a, R22 (legacy)

---

### **GEA BOCK (Reciprocating & Screw)**

**Direct Mount:**
âœ… GEA Bock HG / HA series (40 mm pitch)
âœ… GEA Bock FK / FX screw (40 mm pitch)

**Compatible Models:**
â€¢ HG12e, HG22e, HG34e (reciprocating)
â€¢ FK40, FK50, FX4 (screw)

**Refrigerant:**
â€¢ R404A, R407C, R134a
â€¢ R410A (screw models - requires TK3+ 80bar)

---

### **DANFOSS (Maneurop Reciprocating)**

**Adapter Required:**
âš ï¸ Danfoss MTZ / NTZ series (non-standard flange)
âš ï¸ Use **Danfoss adapter kit** (Part: DF-02)

**Danfoss Adapter Kit (DF-02):**
â€¢ Adapts MTZ/NTZ to 40 mm standard
â€¢ Material: Brass, Viton gasket
â€¢ Installation: 20 minutes

**Compatible Models (with adapter):**
â€¢ MTZ28, MTZ32, MTZ40, MTZ50, MTZ64, MTZ80
â€¢ NTZ48, NTZ68, NTZ96

**Refrigerant:**
â€¢ R404A, R407C, R134a

---

### **HERMETIC COMPRESSORS (Welded)**

**NOT DIRECTLY COMPATIBLE:**
âŒ Hermetic compressors (welded shell) have NO external oil sump access

**Examples:**
â€¢ Embraco/Aspera (household refrigeration)
â€¢ Tecumseh (small commercial)
â€¢ Panasonic/Sanyo (small AC)

**Alternative Solution:**
â€¢ Monitor **oil separator** (if present) on high side
â€¢ Or monitor **suction accumulator** (if equipped with oil return)

---

## FLANGE ADAPTER SELECTION GUIDE

**Decision Tree:**

**STEP 1: Identify Compressor Brand**
â€¢ Bitzer â†’ Direct mount (no adapter)
â€¢ Copeland â†’ Direct mount (no adapter)
â€¢ Carrier 06D/06E â†’ Direct mount (40 mm or 38 mm pitch)
â€¢ Carrier 5H/5F â†’ Adapter CA-01
â€¢ Frascold D/V/NRH/Q â†’ Direct mount (40 mm)
â€¢ Frascold S â†’ Use secondary pitch 38 mm (or adapter FR-03)
â€¢ Dorin â†’ Direct mount (40 mm)
â€¢ GEA Bock â†’ Direct mount (40 mm)
â€¢ Danfoss MTZ/NTZ â†’ Adapter DF-02
â€¢ Hermetic â†’ NOT compatible (use oil separator)

**STEP 2: Verify Flange Pitch**
â€¢ Measure bolt hole spacing (center-to-center)
â€¢ 40 mm â†’ Use TK3+ primary pitch
â€¢ 38 mm â†’ Use TK3+ secondary pitch
â€¢ Other â†’ Adapter required

**STEP 3: Check Bolt Size**
â€¢ M6 threads â†’ Standard (TK3+ includes M6 bolts)
â€¢ M8 threads â†’ Use adapter with M8 (rare)

**STEP 4: Select Gasket**
â€¢ Viton gasket (included with TK3+)
â€¢ **Replace gasket** at every sensor removal/installation

---

## ADAPTER KIT CONTENTS & INSTALLATION

**Typical Adapter Kit Includes:**
â€¢ Adapter plate (brass, anodized aluminum, or stainless steel)
â€¢ Bolts: 4Ã— M6 (compressor side), 2Ã— M6 (sensor side)
â€¢ Gaskets: 2Ã— Viton (compressor + sensor)
â€¢ Installation instructions

**Installation Steps (with Adapter):**

1. **Prepare Compressor:**
   - System OFF, depressurized
   - Clean oil sump flange (remove old gasket, oil residue)
   - Inspect flange surface (flat, no scratches)

2. **Install Adapter to Compressor:**
   - Place Viton gasket on compressor flange
   - Align adapter holes with compressor flange
   - Install 4Ã— M6 bolts (hand-tight)
   - Torque: 15-20 Nm (cross pattern)

3. **Install TK3+ to Adapter:**
   - Place second Viton gasket on adapter
   - Align TK3+ sensor (vertical, sensor tip pointing down)
   - Install 2Ã— M6 bolts (hand-tight)
   - Torque: 15-20 Nm

4. **Pressure Test:**
   - Pressurize system to 10 bar (nitrogen)
   - Soap bubble test: Check adapter + sensor flanges
   - No leaks â†’ Continue
   - Leaks â†’ Re-torque bolts, check gaskets

5. **Wire Connections:**
   - Connect 7-pin wiring (per TK3+ manual)
   - Test: Power ON, verify LED operation

---

## SPECIAL INSTALLATIONS

### **Screw Compressors (Oil Separator)**

Screw compressors inject oil for cooling/sealing:
â€¢ Oil separator extracts oil from discharge gas
â€¢ Oil returns to compressor via oil management system
â€¢ **TK3+ location options:**
  1. **Compressor oil sump** (low side + oil pump pressure)
  2. **Oil separator** (high side condenser pressure)

**Installation on Oil Separator:**
â€¢ Pressure: Condenser pressure (28 bar R410A)
â€¢ **TK3+ 80bar**: âœ… Safe (52 bar margin)
â€¢ **Advantage**: Monitors total system oil (compressor + separator)
â€¢ **Disadvantage**: Higher pressure exposure (use safety margin)

---

### **Parallel Compressor Racks**

Multiple compressors with common oil sump:
â€¢ TK3+ monitors **common oil level** (one sensor for all)
â€¢ Install on **oil equalization line** or **common receiver**

**Rack Configuration:**
â€¢ 2-6 compressors in parallel
â€¢ Oil equalization piping (balances oil between compressors)
â€¢ **TK3+ location**: Common sump or equalization manifold

**Benefits:**
âœ… Single sensor monitors entire rack
âœ… Simplifies wiring (one 24V power, one relay output)
âœ… Cost savings vs. individual sensors

---

### **Inverter-Driven Compressors (VFD)**

Variable Frequency Drive (VFD) for capacity modulation:
â€¢ Speed: 30-90 Hz (50% to 150% capacity)
â€¢ Oil pump pressure varies with speed

**TK3+ Compatibility:**
âœ… Works with VFD (no speed sensor needed)
âœ… Optical detection independent of oil flow/turbulence
âœ… **Programmable timer**: Compensates for slow speed (low oil flow)

**Timer Setting for VFD:**
â€¢ Standard (fixed speed): 3 seconds
â€¢ **VFD (variable speed)**: 5-7 seconds
  - Reason: At low speed (30 Hz), oil movement slower
  - Timer prevents false alarms during speed changes

---

### **Scroll Compressors (No Oil Pump)**

Scroll compressors use **oil sump + scroll orbiting motion**:
â€¢ No dedicated oil pump (oil circulates via pressure difference)
â€¢ Oil level more critical (no active pumping)

**TK3+ Installation:**
â€¢ Mount on **compressor body oil sump** (bottom port)
â€¢ **Timer**: 2-3 seconds (oil movement less turbulent)
â€¢ **Critical application**: Oil loss â†’ rapid scroll wear

**R410A Scroll (Copeland ZP):**
â€¢ High-side pressure: 26-30 bar
â€¢ Compressor sump pressure: 10-15 bar (low side + oil residence)
â€¢ **TK3+ 80bar**: âœ… Perfect (65 bar margin on sump)

---

## INSTALLATION BEST PRACTICES

**Sensor Orientation:**
âœ… **Vertical** (sensor tip pointing straight down)
âŒ Tilted >15Â° â†’ Detection error
âŒ Horizontal â†’ Will not work

**Flange Torque:**
â€¢ Torque: **15-20 Nm** (M6 bolts)
â€¢ Pattern: Cross pattern (1-3, then 2-4)
â€¢ **Over-torque** (>25 Nm): Brass flange deformation, gasket crush
â€¢ **Under-torque** (<15 Nm): Leaks

**Gasket Replacement:**
âœ… **ALWAYS replace Viton gasket** when removing sensor
â€¢ Old gasket: Compressed, loses sealing
â€¢ Cost: â‚¬2-5 (cheap insurance vs. refrigerant leak)

**Wiring Protection:**
â€¢ Use **metal conduit** or **cable gland** (strain relief)
â€¢ Avoid sharp bends (min radius: 50 mm)
â€¢ **Shielded cable**: Ground at controller (not compressor)

**Vibration Isolation:**
â€¢ **NOT required** for TK3+ (vibration-resistant design)
â€¢ Rigid flange mount: Vibration <2 mm amplitude OK
â€¢ If vibration >2 mm: Fix compressor mounting (not sensor)

---

## RETROFIT & REPLACEMENT

**Replacing Mechanical Float:**

Old system has mechanical float switch:
1. Recover refrigerant (or isolate compressor section)
2. Remove mechanical float (unbolt from flange)
3. Clean flange surface (remove old gasket)
4. Install TK3+ with new Viton gasket
5. **Wiring**: Replace float wiring with TK3+ 7-pin cable
6. Pressure test + recharge
7. **Adjust timer**: Start with 3s, tune based on system response

**Advantages Over Float:**
âœ… Higher pressure rating (mechanical floats â‰¤40 bar)
âœ… No moving parts (no wear, no recalibration)
âœ… Programmable timer (eliminates nuisance alarms)
âœ… Dual output (relay + 4-20mA for PLC)

---

**Replacing Capacitive Sensor:**

Old system has capacitive oil level sensor:
1. Remove capacitive sensor (often 1-1/4" NPT thread)
2. **Adapter needed**: NPT to flange (Part: NPT-FL-01)
3. Install NPT-to-flange adapter on compressor
4. Install TK3+ on adapter flange
5. **No recalibration needed** (optical vs. capacitive)
6. **Wiring**: Standard TK3+ 7-pin (capacitive used 3-4 wires)

**Advantages Over Capacitive:**
âœ… Oil type independent (capacitive needs calibration per oil)
âœ… No contamination sensitivity (capacitive affected by moisture/acid)
âœ… No geographic calibration (capacitive affected by gravity variation)

---

## TROUBLESHOOTING COMPATIBILITY ISSUES

**Issue 1: Flange Holes Don't Align**

**Cause**: Non-standard compressor flange

**Solution**:
1. Measure bolt pitch (center-to-center distance)
2. If 40 mm: Use TK3+ primary pitch
3. If 38 mm: Use TK3+ secondary pitch
4. If other: Order custom adapter (contact Teklab)

---

**Issue 2: Bolt Threads Don't Match**

**Cause**: Compressor uses M8 or imperial threads

**Solution**:
â€¢ M8 threads: Use M8 bolts (not included, purchase locally)
â€¢ Imperial (UNC): Use adapter with metric conversion
â€¢ Rare (mostly European compressors use M6)

---

**Issue 3: Oil Sump Too Small**

**Cause**: Small compressor (<1 HP), shallow sump

**Solution**:
â€¢ TK3+ sensor tip length: 40 mm (extends into sump)
â€¢ If sump depth <50 mm: Sensor may bottom out
â€¢ **Alternative**: Install on oil separator or suction accumulator

---

**Issue 4: Sensor Detects Oil When Empty**

**Cause**: Sensor installed **above oil level**

**Solution**:
âœ… Install at **lowest point** of oil sump
âœ… Sensor tip must be **submerged** when oil present
âŒ If installed high: Sensor in vapor space (no detection)

---

## ADAPTER PART NUMBERS & ORDERING

**Teklab Adapter Kits:**

â€¢ **CA-01**: Carrier 5H/5F to standard 40 mm (â‚¬45)
â€¢ **FR-03**: Frascold 38 mm to 40 mm (â‚¬35)
â€¢ **DF-02**: Danfoss MTZ/NTZ to 40 mm (â‚¬40)
â€¢ **NPT-FL-01**: 1-1/4" NPT to flange 40 mm (â‚¬50)
â€¢ **Custom**: Contact Teklab for non-standard (quote)

**Included:**
â€¢ Adapter plate
â€¢ Bolts (M6 standard)
â€¢ 2Ã— Viton gaskets
â€¢ Installation instructions (EN, IT, FR, DE, ES)

**Ordering:**
ðŸ“§ sales@teklab.eu
ðŸ“ž +39 [phone]
ðŸŒ www.teklab.eu/adapters

**Lead Time**: 5-10 business days (stock adapters), 3-4 weeks (custom)

---

## COMPATIBILITY SUMMARY TABLE

| **Brand** | **Adapter Needed?** | **Part Number** | **Flange Pitch** |
|-----------|---------------------|-----------------|------------------|
| Bitzer | âŒ No (direct) | - | 40 mm |
| Copeland | âŒ No (direct) | - | 40 mm |
| Carrier 06D/06E | âŒ No (direct) | - | 40/38 mm |
| Carrier 5H/5F | âœ… Yes | CA-01 | Custom â†’ 40 mm |

---

**EXPERT CONSULTATION:**

For custom applications, non-standard compressors, or installation assistance:

ðŸ“§ **support@teklab.eu**

ðŸ“± **Technical Hotline**: Available 9:00-18:00 CET

Provide:
â€¢ Compressor brand + model number
â€¢ Refrigerant type
â€¢ System pressure (max operating)
â€¢ Photo of oil sump flange (if possible)

**TK3+ 80bar Compressor Compatibility & Adapter Selection Guide**

Comprehensive guide for installing TK3+ 80bar on various compressor brands, including direct mount compatibility and adapter requirements.

---

## DUAL PITCH FLANGE DESIGN

**TK3+ 80bar Universal Compatibility:**
â€¢ **Primary pitch**: 40 mm (Bitzer, Copeland, most brands)
â€¢ **Secondary pitch**: 38 mm (Carrier, some Frascold)
â€¢ **Advantage**: Direct mount on 90% of compressors (no adapter)

---

## COMPRESSOR COMPATIBILITY BY BRAND

### **BITZER (Reciprocating & Screw)**
âœ… **Direct Mount - No Adapter**
â€¢ Flange: 40 mm (primary pitch)
â€¢ Models: 2JES, 4JE, 6JE, 4NES, 6NE, 4TES, 6TE (reciprocating)
â€¢ Screw: CSH6563, CSH7563, HSN6461, OSK8571
â€¢ Refrigerants: R410A, R407C, R404A, R134a
â€¢ Mounting: 2Ã— M6 bolts, 15-20 Nm torque

---

### **COPELAND (Scroll & Reciprocating)**
âœ… **Direct Mount - No Adapter**
â€¢ Flange: 40 mm (primary pitch)
â€¢ **Scroll**: ZP120, ZP137, ZP154, ZP182, ZP235 (R410A)
â€¢ **Scroll**: ZR125, ZR160, ZR190, ZR250 (R404A, R134a)
â€¢ **Reciprocating**: DLSJ-200, D4DH-200, D6DJ-200
â€¢ **R410A PRIMARY**: Copeland ZP series (26-30 bar) â†’ TK3+ 80bar perfect match

**Oil Separator Option:**
â€¢ Many scroll systems use oil separator (high side)
â€¢ TK3+ can mount on separator (sees 28 bar condenser pressure)
â€¢ Safe: 52 bar margin

---

### **CARRIER (Semi-Hermetic)**
âœ… **Direct Mount** (06D, 06E series - 40mm or 38mm pitch)
âš ï¸ **Adapter Required** (5H, 5F series - custom pitch)

**Carrier Adapter Kit: CA-01** (â‚¬45)
â€¢ Adapts 5H/5F to standard 40 mm
â€¢ Includes: Adapter plate, bolts, gaskets
â€¢ Installation: 15 minutes

**Models:**
â€¢ Direct: 06D-228, 06E-299, 06E-350
â€¢ With adapter: 5H40, 5H60, 5H80, 5F40, 5F60

---

### **FRASCOLD (Semi-Hermetic)**
âœ… **Direct Mount** (D, V, NRH, Q series - 40mm)
âš ï¸ **Secondary Pitch or Adapter** (S series - 38mm)

**Frascold Adapter: FR-03** (â‚¬35) - Optional
â€¢ Use TK3+ secondary pitch 38mm (direct) OR adapter

**Models:**
â€¢ Direct: D2-13.1Y, D3-16.1Y, V5-108Y, NRH2-35-160Y
â€¢ Secondary pitch: S15-50.1Y, S20-62.1Y

---

### **DORIN (Semi-Hermetic)**
âœ… **Direct Mount - No Adapter**
â€¢ Flange: 40 mm
â€¢ Models: H251CC, H303CS, H403CS, CD300H, CD400H, CD500H

---

### **GEA BOCK (Reciprocating & Screw)**
âœ… **Direct Mount - No Adapter**
â€¢ Flange: 40 mm
â€¢ Models: HG12e, HG22e, HG34e (reciprocating), FK40, FK50, FX4 (screw)

---

### **DANFOSS (Maneurop)**
âš ï¸ **Adapter Required**

**Danfoss Adapter: DF-02** (â‚¬40)
â€¢ Adapts MTZ/NTZ to 40 mm
â€¢ Models: MTZ28, MTZ32, MTZ40, MTZ50, MTZ64, MTZ80, NTZ48, NTZ68, NTZ96

---

### **HERMETIC COMPRESSORS**
âŒ **NOT Compatible**
â€¢ Welded shell (no external oil sump access)
â€¢ Examples: Embraco, Tecumseh, Panasonic, Sanyo
â€¢ **Alternative**: Monitor oil separator or suction accumulator

---

## ADAPTER SELECTION GUIDE

**Decision Tree:**

1. **Identify brand**:
   - Bitzer, Copeland, Dorin, GEA Bock â†’ Direct mount âœ…
   - Carrier 06D/06E â†’ Direct mount âœ…
   - Carrier 5H/5F â†’ Adapter CA-01 âš ï¸
   - Frascold D/V/NRH/Q â†’ Direct mount âœ…
   - Frascold S â†’ Secondary pitch 38mm or adapter FR-03 âš ï¸
   - Danfoss MTZ/NTZ â†’ Adapter DF-02 âš ï¸
   - Hermetic â†’ NOT compatible âŒ

2. **Verify flange pitch**:
   - 40 mm â†’ Primary pitch (most brands)
   - 38 mm â†’ Secondary pitch (Carrier, Frascold S)
   - Other â†’ Custom adapter (contact Teklab)

3. **Check bolt size**:
   - M6 â†’ Standard (included)
   - M8 â†’ Purchase locally (rare)

---

## ADAPTER INSTALLATION STEPS

1. **Prepare compressor**:
   - System OFF, depressurized
   - Clean flange (remove old gasket, oil)

2. **Install adapter to compressor**:
   - Viton gasket on compressor flange
   - Align adapter, install 4Ã— M6 bolts
   - Torque: 15-20 Nm (cross pattern)

3. **Install TK3+ to adapter**:
   - Second gasket on adapter
   - Align sensor (vertical, tip down)
   - Install 2Ã— M6 bolts, torque 15-20 Nm

4. **Pressure test**:
   - 10 bar nitrogen
   - Soap bubble test

5. **Wire & test**:
   - Connect 7-pin wiring
   - Power ON, verify LED

---

## SPECIAL INSTALLATIONS

### **Screw Compressors (Oil Separator)**
â€¢ TK3+ location options:
  1. Compressor oil sump (low side)
  2. Oil separator (high side - 28 bar R410A)
â€¢ **TK3+ 80bar**: âœ… Safe on separator (52 bar margin)

---

### **Parallel Compressor Racks**
â€¢ Multiple compressors, common oil sump
â€¢ **TK3+ location**: Common sump or equalization manifold
â€¢ **Benefit**: Single sensor monitors entire rack

---

### **Inverter-Driven (VFD)**
â€¢ Speed: 30-90 Hz (variable capacity)
â€¢ **TK3+ compatible**: âœ… No speed sensor needed
â€¢ **Timer setting**: 5-7 seconds (vs. 3s fixed speed)
  - Compensates for slow oil flow at low speed

---

### **Scroll Compressors (No Oil Pump)**
â€¢ Oil circulates via pressure difference (no pump)
â€¢ **TK3+ critical**: Oil loss â†’ rapid scroll wear
â€¢ **Timer**: 2-3 seconds (less turbulent)
â€¢ **R410A scroll**: Copeland ZP (10-15 bar sump) â†’ TK3+ 80bar âœ…

---

## INSTALLATION BEST PRACTICES

**Sensor Orientation:**
âœ… Vertical (tip pointing straight down)
âŒ Tilted >15Â° â†’ Detection error
âŒ Horizontal â†’ Will not work

**Flange Torque:**
â€¢ **15-20 Nm** (M6 bolts, cross pattern)
â€¢ Over-torque >25 Nm: Brass deformation
â€¢ Under-torque <15 Nm: Leaks

**Gasket Replacement:**
âœ… **ALWAYS replace Viton gasket** when removing sensor
â€¢ Old gasket loses sealing (â‚¬2-5 cheap insurance)

**Wiring:**
â€¢ Metal conduit or cable gland (strain relief)
â€¢ Min bend radius: 50 mm
â€¢ Shielded cable: Ground at controller (not compressor)

**Vibration:**
â€¢ **NOT required** for TK3+ (vibration-resistant)
â€¢ If vibration >2 mm: Fix compressor mounting

---

## RETROFIT & REPLACEMENT

### **Replacing Mechanical Float**
1. Recover refrigerant (or isolate)
2. Remove float, clean flange
3. Install TK3+ with new gasket
4. Replace wiring (7-pin cable)
5. Pressure test, recharge
6. Adjust timer (start 3s)

**Advantages:**
âœ… Higher pressure (floats â‰¤40 bar)
âœ… No moving parts (no wear)
âœ… Programmable timer
âœ… Dual output (relay + 4-20mA)

---

### **Replacing Capacitive Sensor**
1. Remove capacitive (often NPT thread)
2. **Adapter**: NPT-FL-01 (â‚¬50) - NPT to flange
3. Install TK3+ on adapter
4. **No recalibration** (optical vs. capacitive)

**Advantages:**
âœ… Oil type independent (capacitive needs calibration)
âœ… No contamination sensitivity
âœ… No geographic calibration

---

## TROUBLESHOOTING

**Issue: Flange Holes Don't Align**
â€¢ Measure bolt pitch
â€¢ 40 mm: Primary pitch
â€¢ 38 mm: Secondary pitch
â€¢ Other: Custom adapter (contact Teklab)

**Issue: Bolt Threads Don't Match**
â€¢ M8: Use M8 bolts (purchase locally)
â€¢ Imperial: Adapter with metric conversion

**Issue: Oil Sump Too Small**
â€¢ Sensor tip: 40 mm length
â€¢ If sump <50 mm: Install on oil separator

**Issue: Sensor Detects Oil When Empty**
â€¢ Cause: Installed above oil level
â€¢ Solution: Install at **lowest point** (tip submerged)
